item.title: [317] starting animations help please![317]
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

source: Delta

Code i am using for it its herblore.[code] // Guam used on Vial
if (itemUsed == 227 && useWith == 249 || itemUsed == 249 && useWith == 227) {
if (playerLevel[15] >= 1) {
startAnimation(3283);

		deleteItem(227, getItemSlot(227), 1);
		deleteItem(249, getItemSlot(249), 1);

                                            addItem(91, 1);                                                addSkillXP(40, 15);
                                            sendMessage("You combine the ingredients together to form an unfinished potion");
                                    }
                            }[/code]

Ok everything works fine no compiler errors but the animation wont start up like it isnt there.

I’ve looked at it in my client and it works for ladders this code so i dont know why it isn’t working for this.

Please Help

Thanks

Read full topic
